players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the killer. He set up Alice last night and is trying to frame me. If you're town, don’t let him rush a mislynch—let’s hear Bob first."
You: "Slow down. Diana, why are you so sure about Charlie? What info do you have? Charlie, what’s your take and last night’s timing? Also, detective: if you have a guilty, now’s the time to claim."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. I’m the detective. I investigated her last night and got a red. She’s pushing a pre-emptive smear because she knows I can out her. Bob, vote Diana and we win."
Diana: remained silent.

You: "Charlie, full claim: what exactly is Diana’s role result and why Alice over others? Diana, counter: are you claiming detective or VT? Any reason Charlie’s story doesn’t fit? Everyone, hold votes till both answer."

Charlie: "Bob, I got a red on Diana: result = Mafioso. I picked Diana N1 because Alice felt towny in pre-flip meta; Diana pre-bussed me instantly at D1 start, which fits scum knowing I’m the cop. There’s no counterclaim—Diana must be the mafioso. Please vote Diana and end it."
Votes: Bob voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Diana was arrested

players.name: Charlie

The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Diana knows you're the detective.

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
